py.template: echo 'Checking for Python...' && command -v python || (echo 'Python not found. Install now? [y/n]' && read confirm && [ "$confirm" = "y" ] && echo 'Installing Python...' && pkg install -y python) && echo 'Running %2$s...' && python "%2$s" 2>&1 | tee %3$s && echo "%4$s"

java.template: echo 'Checking for Java compiler...' && command -v javac || (echo 'Java not found. Install OpenJDK? [y/n]' && read confirm && [ "$confirm" = "y" ] && echo 'Installing OpenJDK...' && pkg install -y openjdk) && echo 'Compiling %2$s...' && javac "%2$s" 2>&1 | tee %3$s && FILENAME=`basename "%2$s" .java` && FILEDIR=`dirname "%2$s"` && echo 'Running %2$s...' && (cd "$FILEDIR" && java "$FILENAME") 2>&1 | tee -a %3$s && echo "%4$s" && rm -f "%2$s" "$FILEDIR/$FILENAME.class"

c.template: echo 'Checking for C compiler...' && command -v clang || (echo 'Clang not found. Install now? [y/n]' && read confirm && [ "$confirm" = "y" ] && echo 'Installing Clang...' && pkg install -y clang) && echo 'Compiling %2$s...' && clang "%2$s" -o %2$s.out 2>&1 | tee %3$s && echo 'Running %2$s.out...' && "%2$s.out" 2>&1 | tee -a %3$s && echo "%4$s" && rm -f "%2$s" "%2$s.out"

cpp.template: echo 'Checking for C++ compiler...' && command -v clang++ || (echo 'Clang++ not found. Install now? [y/n]' && read confirm && [ "$confirm" = "y" ] && echo 'Installing Clang++...' && pkg install -y clang) && echo 'Compiling %2$s...' && clang++ "%2$s" -o %2$s.out 2>&1 | tee %3$s && echo 'Running %2$s.out...' && "%2$s.out" 2>&1 | tee -a %3$s && echo "%4$s" && rm -f "%2$s" "%2$s.out"

node.template: echo 'Checking for Node.js...' && command -v node || (echo 'Node.js not found. Install now? [y/n]' && read confirm && [ "$confirm" = "y" ] && echo 'Installing Node.js...' && pkg install -y nodejs) && echo 'Running %2$s...' && node "%2$s" 2>&1 | tee %3$s && echo "%4$s"

php.template: echo 'Checking for PHP...' && command -v php || (echo 'PHP not found. Install now? [y/n]' && read confirm && [ "$confirm" = "y" ] && echo 'Installing PHP...' && pkg install -y php) && echo 'Running %2$s...' && php "%2$s" 2>&1 | tee %3$s && echo "%4$s"

ruby.template: echo 'Checking for Ruby...' && command -v ruby || (echo 'Ruby not found. Install now? [y/n]' && read confirm && [ "$confirm" = "y" ] && echo 'Installing Ruby...' && pkg install -y ruby) && echo 'Running %2$s...' && ruby "%2$s" 2>&1 | tee %3$s && echo "%4$s"

go.template: echo 'Checking for Go...' && command -v go || (echo 'Go not found. Install now? [y/n]' && read confirm && [ "$confirm" = "y" ] && echo 'Installing Go...' && pkg install -y golang) && echo 'Running %2$s...' && go run "%2$s" 2>&1 | tee %3$s && echo "%4$s"

rust.template: echo 'Checking for Rust...' && command -v rustc || (echo 'Rust not found. Install now? [y/n]' && read confirm && [ "$confirm" = "y" ] && echo 'Installing Rust...' && pkg install -y rust) && echo 'Compiling %2$s...' && rustc "%2$s" -o %2$s.out 2>&1 | tee %3$s && echo 'Running %2$s.out...' && "%2$s.out" 2>&1 | tee -a %3$s && echo "%4$s" && rm -f "%2$s" "%2$s.out"

kotlin.template: echo 'Checking for Kotlin...' && command -v kotlinc || (echo 'Kotlin not found. Install now? [y/n]' && read confirm && [ "$confirm" = "y" ] && echo 'Installing Kotlin...' && pkg install -y kotlin) && echo 'Compiling %2$s...' && kotlinc "%2$s" -include-runtime -d %2$s.jar 2>&1 | tee %3$s && echo 'Running MainKt...' && dalvikvm -cp %2$s.jar MainKt 2>&1 | tee -a %3$s && echo "%4$s"

csharp.template: echo 'Checking for Mono C#...' && command -v mcs || (echo 'Mono not found. Install now? [y/n]' && read confirm && [ "$confirm" = "y" ] && echo 'Installing Mono...' && pkg install -y mono) && echo 'Compiling %2$s...' && mcs "%2$s" -out:%2$s.exe 2>&1 | tee %3$s && echo 'Running %2$s.exe...' && mono %2$s.exe 2>&1 | tee -a %3$s && echo "%4$s" && rm -f "%2$s" "%2$s.exe"

perl.template: echo 'Checking for Perl...' && command -v perl || (echo 'Perl not found. Install now? [y/n]' && read confirm && [ "$confirm" = "y" ] && echo 'Installing Perl...' && pkg install -y perl) && echo 'Running %2$s...' && perl "%2$s" 2>&1 | tee %3$s && echo "%4$s"

terminal.template: echo 'Checking for Bash...' && command -v bash || (echo 'Bash not found. Install now? [y/n]' && read confirm && [ "$confirm" = "y" ] && echo 'Installing Bash...' && pkg install -y bash) && echo 'Running %2$s...' && bash "%2$s" 2>&1 | tee %3$s && echo "%4$s"
